original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: Tulsi Gabbard, the Director of National Intelligence, claims that Russia did not favor either Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton in the 2016 US presidential election, contradicting the key Russiagate claim. She alleges that Obama-era officials fabricated evidence of Russian collusion with Trump to delegitimize his election win.</s>
